title: The Pacific - ID Font - Slab Serif
author: Sant10

comments.content: This is more of an [inscriptional serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014003/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/alternatives/trajan/?&sample_text=PACIFIC&update=0) than it is a slab.

It's not Penumbra Half-Serif, although that might do in a pinch.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/penumbra-half-serif/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014003/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/penumbra-half-serif/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/penumbra-half-serif/")

I was going to say a customized Trajan, until I looked at Stephen's list. I think Mecanorma's [Galba](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014003/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/Galba/fonts/) is closer. Almost the only thing it needs is to close the P. The C shape is what makes me choose it. The relative angle of the serifs seems like the PACIFIC lettering, even more than Trajan, and the serifs on the E and F are more like the sample.

- Mike Yanega
